HUAWEI Health Kit provides you with cross-application fitness and health data openness capabilities.\n

You need to perform the following authorization actions:\n1. Authorize the %s app to access your allowed personal information including health and fitness data by HUAWEI ID.\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit.
API calling error. Please try again.
The user is not using HUAWEI Health.
The registration place of the login account is not in the supported countries and regions.
\n • Manually enabled: Install the latest HUAWEI Health app, open HUAWEI Health app and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
How to enable: \n1. Install the latest HUAWEI Health app. \n2. Open HUAWEI Health app, and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
How to enable: \n1. Update the HUAWEI Health app to the latest version. \n2. Open HUAWEI Health app, and go to Me > Privacy management > Link HUAWEI Health Kit.
1. The HUAWEI ID has successfully authorized the %s app to access your personal information including health and fitness data.\n
1. The HUAWEI ID has failed authorize the %s app to access your personal information including health and fitness data.
\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit failed.
\n2. Link HUAWEI Health app to Huawei Health Kit successfully.
updates health records of a specified HealthRecordID
Some features in %1$s may not work properly without HMS Core, which is not installed on your device.
%1$s is unable to use HMS Core. Launch Optimizer (Phone Manager) or go to Settings, enable all permissions for %2$s (including auto-launch and secondary launch), and try again.
It appears that you have an unofficial version of HMS Core (%1$s) installed on your device. Please uninstall HMS Core from Settings and return to this app to install the official version.

Touch Login to complete login and authorization, and then use other buttons to try the related API functions.Note: If the login dialog box is not displayed, change the package name, app ID, and configure the signature file by referring to the developer guide on the official website.
